name: The King of Fighters '96: NEOGEO Collection
overview: The King of Fighters '96 Neo Geo Collection, was released on February 14, 1997 to promote the year's title. It was a Database released to promote the release of KoF '96. It was available only for the Neo-Geo CD. The database includes the game's intro, an interactive re-enactment of the game's backstory, character profiles spoken by their voice actors, outtakes, an exclusive gallery section from the creators, a complete command list and a sound selection.
